results.p: Pfft definition: (used to express or indicate a dying or fizzling out.). See examples of PFFT used in a sentence.

results.t: PFFT | definition in the Cambridge English Dictionary
results.p: PFFT meaning: 1. If a machine goes pfft, it suddenly stops working. 2. If a machine goes pfft, it suddenly stops…. Learn more.

results.t: PFFT definition and meaning | Collins English Dictionary
results.p: 6 days ago — a sound that indicates the sudden disappearance or cessation of something. And the next day - Pfft! She and the baby were gone.

results.t: What's the word for when someone makes a "pfft" sound to ...
results.p: "Pfft" is an onomatopoeic, and therefore only represent a sound. If used in a different context, it can represent something different.

results.t: What does “pfft” mean in American English?
results.p: “Pfft” is the sound made by forcing air between your lips. In this context, it means “I dismiss what you just said.”.
pfft · all gone · by the board · done for · down the tubes · finished · kaput · lost to. Advertisement.
Used to signify sarcasm or disagreement. (onomatopoeia) Used to signify a puffing sound.

results.t: How to pronounce PFFT in English - Cambridge Dictionary
results.p: Aug 28, 2024 — How to pronounce PFFT. How to say PFFT. Listen to the audio pronunciation in the Cambridge English Dictionary. Learn more.
Pfft definition: Used to express or indicate a usually sudden disappearance or ending.

results.t: What does "pfft" mean in American English?
results.p: Dec 21, 2019 — "used to express a contemptuous or dismissive attitude". Other examples: Hmmm; Ha! Mmmmm; Aah; Uh-huh ...
